backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, video posts, comments, follows, and notifications with access control and blob storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing required UI updates for the Landing/Login page's primary login button.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries of all frontend files, describing their purpose across routing, pages, components, hooks, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS config defining light and dark theme color tokens and base styles for the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app root and main script with metadata and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring authentication, routing, and profile setup gating using TanStack Router and Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for first‑time users to create a username with validation and profile save mutation.
frontend/src/components/comments/Comment: Bottom sheet for viewing and adding comments on a video post with author avatars and timestamps.
frontend/src/components/common/ScreenSta: Reusable loading, error, and empty state UI components for consistent screen feedback.
frontend/src/components/feed/EngagementB: Displays like and comment buttons for a video post with stateful like handling and a comments sheet toggle.
frontend/src/components/feed/VideoPostVi: Renders an auto‑playing video post with play controls, creator info, and caption overlay using an intersection observer.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header, logout, content area, and bottom navigation with notification badges.
frontend/src/components/profile/EditProf: Dialog for editing a user profile, including username, bio, and avatar upload with validation and save handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/FollowBu: Provides a follow button that reflects follow status and triggers follow mutations for a given user.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileP: Displays a grid of user video posts with thumbnails, hover overlays, and timestamp info.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity login, logout, and identity state management using AuthClient with context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profiles, video posts, notifications, and follow actions, wrapping backend actor calls.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, plus global styling utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Displays a scrollable feed of video posts with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/LandingLoginPage.tsx: Landing page with branding and a login button using Internet Identity, plus basic feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/MessagesPage.tsx: Messages overview page showing an empty-state placeholder.
frontend/src/pages/MessageThreadPage.tsx: Shows a message thread placeholder for a specific user, resolving their principal and profile.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Lists user notifications with icons, timestamps, and a control to mark items as read.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Renders a user profile with posts, followers, and edit or follow actions, using multiple data hooks.
frontend/src/pages/UploadPage.tsx: React page for uploading a video with validation, progress tracking, and submission via createPost, then navigating to the profile page.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and manipulating hash‑based query params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, and container settings with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON file describing project metadata, feature set, known issues, and architectural notes for the Helmar app.
